Queries.CreateTable: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'PTMK') BEGIN CREATE DATABASE PTMK; END; USE PTMK; IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sysobjects WHERE name='Employees') BEGIN CREATE TABLE Employees ( Id INT PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY (1, 1), FullName NVARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, BirthDate DateTime2 NOT NULL, IsMale Bit NOT NULL ); END;
Queries.InsertEmployee: USE PTMK; INSERT INTO Employees (FullName, BirthDate, IsMale) VALUES (@FullName, @BirthDate, @IsMale);
Queries.SelectAllEmployees: USE PTMK; SELECT DISTINCT FullName, BirthDate, IsMale FROM Employees ORDER BY FullName;
Queries.SelectAllFMan: USE PTMK; SELECT DISTINCT FullName, BirthDate, IsMale FROM Employees WHERE IsMale = 1 AND FullName LIKE '% F%' ORDER BY FullName;
